title: Zoran Cvetanović
text:
Zoran Cvetanović (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic%20alphabet">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Зоран Цвeтановић; born 11 May 1953) is a Serbian retired <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who played for <a href="FK%20Partizan">FK Partizan</a>.
From 2004 to 2012, he was FK Partizan's marketing director.
